title: New Year, New Me
snippet:
What can you challenge yourself with to be the best you? Here are mine.

In my "year in review" post I mentioned I got into photography. For 2019 one thing I want to do is take a picture a day. There are a few things I hope to achieve with...

title: Year in Review
snippet:
It's always good to do a year in review, and this year was a big year for me, so this will be a big post.

The biggest change for me came in January when I was offered a position at OpenSky, now MoreCommerce to work under Wage. It was a big change, going...

title: Conference Speaking
